𒂗𒆠 Merkur/Malik ☿ King Mark/Mattheus @ Mehrgarh

𒂗𒈨𒅕𒃸 En.Merkar, founder of Uruk (father of King Banda 𒈗𒌉𒁕)

𒂇 MIR in 𒀀𒂇 a-mir emir emissar "messenger" <> Merkur

م ك ر m-k-r plotting… ma 𓎡 𓄿 𓏏 𓀁

𒁮𒃼 tamkārum | merchant | 𒌓𒅗𒊒 tam-ka-ru tangār تاجر tāgir
𒌓𒅗𒊒 t'mar-ka-ru | the merchant | “tamkārum derived from م ك ر m-k-r” ⇔ Marduk 𒌓 ☑ (to march 𓊖)

Despite his proclaimed divine descent from the poems, Enmerkar was not deified as his successors Lugalbanda and Gilgamesh.
